subject: Re: Help with Pro X Ultra Pedals
description_text:
﻿Hi,

Thank you for getting back to me.

My order number is #SSN2230.

My address is:
40 Barrington Avenue
Hull
East Yorkshire
HU5 4BD

It would be great if you could provide some help via remote assistance, the pedals are always plugged into a USB 3.0 port.

I installed ToDesk but everything is in Chinese and does not even translate into English well, I cannot see how I can make an account to give you access, it’s asking for a Chinese mobile number too.
Do you have any user friendly software like Anydesk that works in customer languages? 


Kind regards,
Adam Shelton
M: 07585 110811

> On 11 Dec 2025, at 17:06, Adam Shelton <shelton61@icloud.com> wrote:
> My order number is #SSN2230.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9102 中
